item.title: Installing Open Babel with Pip
item.description: So yesterday I spent at least 3 hours to deal with Python package development in Conda environment. So I wrote this post as a self-reminder, since the steps are somewhat long. And also for those of you who is facing the same problem as I do. Why do I need to use pip when I can use Conda to install Open Babel If you’re an experienced Python package developer you should have known the following trick:
